details.title: Polygonal Detection Thresholds for In-Phase and Quadrature Channels
details.abstract: A joint detection threshold corresponding to a circle around the origin of the in-phase and quadrature components of a radar IF process is equivalent to envelope thresholding. Square and octagonal approximations to the circle are evaluated for prescribed false-alarm probabilities and the variation of detection probability with signal phase.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
